member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob
member.summary: Represents a blob of data in memory.

member.name: C:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode)
member.param: The length of the data being wrapped.
member.summary: Creates a new instance, wrapping the specified data.
member.remarks: If there was a problem creating the blob, or if the data length was zero, then an empty blob will be created.

member.name: C:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode,HarfBuzzSharp.ReleaseDelegate)
member.param: The length of the data being wrapped.
The delegate to invoke when the data is not needed anymore.
member.summary: Creates a new instance, wrapping the specified data.
member.remarks: If there was a problem creating the blob, or if the data length was zero, then an empty blob will be created.

member.name: C:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode,System.Object,HarfBuzzSharp.BlobReleaseDelegate)
member.param: The length of the data being wrapped.
The user data to pass to the release delegate.
The delegate to invoke when the data is not needed anymore.
member.summary: Creates a new instance, wrapping the specified data.
member.remarks: If there was a problem creating the blob, or if the data length was zero, then an empty blob will be created.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.AsSpan
member.summary: Returns a span that wraps the data.
member.returns: Returns the span that wraps the data.
member.remarks: If the data is released, then the span becomes invalid.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.AsStream
member.summary: Returns a stream that wraps the data.
member.returns: Returns the stream that wraps the data.
member.remarks: If the data is released, then the stream becomes invalid.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.Empty
member.summary: Gets a reference to the empty instance.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.FaceCount
member.summary: Gets the number of faces in this blob.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.FromFile(System.String)
member.param: The path to the file to load.
member.summary: Creates a new instance from the contents of the file.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.FromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a new instance from the contents of the stream.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.IsImmutable
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the blob is immutable.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Blob.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of blob data in bytes.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.BlobReleaseDelegate
member.summary: The delegate that will be invoked when a blob is ready to be discarded.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer
member.summary: Represents a text buffer in memory.

member.name: C:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer
member.summary: Creates a new with default values.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.Add(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.param: The cluster value of the code point.
member.summary: Appends a character with the Unicode value and gives it the initial cluster value.
member.remarks: This function does not check the validity of the codepoint.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.AddCodepoints(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.UInt32})
member.param: The span of Unicode code points to append.
member.summary: Appends characters from the span to the buffer.
member.remarks: This function does not check the validity of the characters.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.AddUtf8(System.Byte[])
member.param: The array of UTF-8 character bytes to append.
member.summary: Appends the specified text bytes to the buffer.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.AddUtf8(System.String)
member.param: The array of UTF-8 characters to append.
member.summary: Appends the specified text to the buffer.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.ClearContents
member.remarks: This operation preserves the Unicode functions and replacement code point.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.Direction
member.summary: Get or sets the text flow direction of the buffer.
member.remarks: No shaping can happen without setting the direction, or invoking .

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.GlyphInfos
member.summary: Gets the buffer glyph information array.
member.remarks: The information is valid as long as buffer contents are not modified.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.GlyphPositions
member.summary: Gets the buffer glyph position array.
member.remarks: The positions are valid as long as buffer contents are not modified.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.GuessSegmentProperties
member.summary: Sets the unset buffer segment properties based on the buffer's Unicode contents.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer.
member.remarks: If the new length is greater that the current length, more memory will be allocated. If the new length is less than the current length, the extra items will be cleared.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.ClusterLevel
member.summary: The various levels of buffer clustering.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.ClusterLevel.MonotoneCharacters
member.summary: Cluster values grouped into monotone order.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.ClusterLevel.MonotoneGraphemes
member.summary: Cluster values grouped by graphemes into monotone order.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.ContentType
member.summary: The various types of buffer contents.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.ContentType.Glyphs
member.summary: The buffer contains output glyphs (after shaping).

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.ContentType.Unicode
member.summary: The buffer contains input characters (before shaping).

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.Direction
member.summary: Various text directions that can be set via .

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.Direction.BottomToTop
member.summary: Text is set vertically from bottom to top.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.Direction.LeftToRight
member.summary: Text is set horizontally from left to right.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.Direction.RightToLeft
member.summary: Text is set horizontally from right to left.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.Direction.TopToBottom
member.summary: Text is set vertically from top to bottom.

member.param: The delegate to retrieve the table data.
member.summary: Creates a new instance, using the delegate to assemble the data.

member.summary: Creates a new instance, using the specified typeface blob.

member.param: The zero-based face index in a collection.
member.summary: Creates a new instance, using the specified typeface blob.

member.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified tag.

member.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified tag.

member.summary: Returns the string representation of the feature.
member.returns: Returns the string representation of the feature.

member.summary: Tries to parse the feature string.
member.returns: Returns true on success, otherwise false.

member.summary: Creates a new using a specific font face.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Font.SetFunctionsOpenType
member.summary: Sets the font functions to that of OpenType.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.Font.Shape(HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer,HarfBuzzSharp.Feature[])
member.param: The features to control the shaping process.
member.summary: Shapes the specified buffer using the current font.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.FontExtentsDelegate
member.param: The additional data passed to when the functions were set.
member.summary: The delegate that is invoked when or is invoked.
member.returns: Return true if the has extents, otherwise false.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphAdvanceDelegate
member.param: The additional data passed to when the functions were set.
member.summary: The delegate that is invoked when or is invoked.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphFlags
member.summary: Represents the various glyph flags of a .

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphFlags.UnsafeToBreak
member.summary: If input text is broken at the beginning of the cluster this glyph is part of, then both sides need to be re-shaped, as the result might be different.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphInfo
member.summary: Represents a glyph and its relation to the input text.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphInfo.Cluster
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the character in the original text.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphInfo.Codepoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the Unicode code point (or the glyph index after shaping).
member.remarks: This represents either a Unicode code point (before shaping) or a glyph index (after shaping).

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphInfo.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the glyph mask.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphPosition
member.summary: Represents the position of a glyph, relative to the current point.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphPosition.XAdvance
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the line advances after drawing this glyph when setting text in horizontal direction.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphPosition.XOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the glyph moves horizontally before drawing it.
member.remarks: This should not affect how much the line advances.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphPosition.YAdvance
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the line advances after drawing this glyph when setting text in vertical direction.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.GlyphPosition.YOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the glyph moves horizontally before drawing it.
member.remarks: This should not affect how much the line advances.

member.name: T:HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode
member.remarks: In no case shall the HarfBuzz client modify memory that is passed to HarfBuzz in a blob. If there is any such possibility, should be used such that HarfBuzz makes a copy immediately.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode.ReadOnly
member.summary: Default mode indicating that the memory won't be changed.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode.ReadOnlyMayMakeWriteable
member.summary: The font file was mmap()ed, but should still be used.

member.name: F:HarfBuzzSharp.MemoryMode.Writeable
member.summary: Indicates that the data was copied solely for the purpose of passing to HarfBuzz.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.NativeObject.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this .
member.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.NativeObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

member.name: M:HarfBuzzSharp.NativeObject.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: P:HarfBuzzSharp.NativeObject.Handle
member.summary: Gets or sets the handle to the underlying native object.

member.summary: The delegate that will be invoked when a resource is ready to be discarded.
